00011 #include <ddMd/potentials/angle/AngleFactory.h>
00012 #include <ddMd/simulation/Simulation.h>
00013 
00014 // AnglePotential interface and implementation classes
00015 #include <ddMd/potentials/angle/AnglePotential.h>
00016 #include <ddMd/potentials/angle/AnglePotentialImpl.h>
00017 
00018 // Angle interaction classes
00019 #include <inter/angle/CosineSqAngle.h>
00020 #include <inter/angle/CosineAngle.h>
00021 
00022 namespace DdMd
00023 {
00024 
00025    using namespace Inter;
00026 
00030    AngleFactory::AngleFactory(Simulation& simulation)
00031     : Factory<AnglePotential>(),
00032       simulationPtr_(&simulation)
00033    {}
00034 
00035    /*
00036    * Return a pointer to a new AnglePotential, if possible.
00037    */
00038    AnglePotential* 
00039    AngleFactory::factory(const std::string& name) const
00040    {
00041       AnglePotential* ptr = 0;
00042 
00043       // Try subfactories first.
00044       ptr = trySubfactories(name);
00045       if (ptr) return ptr;
00046 
00047       if (name == "CosineSqAngle") {
00048          ptr = new AnglePotentialImpl<CosineSqAngle>(*simulationPtr_);
00049       } else
00050       if (name == "CosineAngle") {
00051          ptr = new AnglePotentialImpl<CosineAngle>(*simulationPtr_);
00052       } //else
00053       return ptr;
00054    }
00055 
00056 }
00057 #endif
